concept.title: Member Profiles: Edit and View
concept.abstract: Objects on specific pages in the Community Portal present a modal when clicked. Staff users can assign the field set that is displayed in the Profile View and Profile Edit view on the Community Group Detail page.

conbody.p: The Members tab presents group members in a tile view listing. When portal users click on a tile, the Member Profile will appear displaying the information for the current field set assigned by the Administrator.

The My Profile button is displayed for group members in the Community Portal. Click the My Profile button on the banner to view the profile as it looks to other Community Portal users. Click the Edit Member button to update personal group member profile.

A field set is a grouping of fields. To define the profile views, staff users can assign a field set via:
Group Member Edit Field Sets-References the field set that defines the attributes to be updated by the group member when editing their group member profile.
Group Member View Field Sets-References the field set that defines the attributes to be seen on the group member profile.
